data.title: Elective Affinities - The Films of Daniele Huillet and Jean-Marie
data.meta_description: Elective Affinities_ the Films of Daniele Huillet and Jean-Marie - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This study examines the collaborative work of the filmmakers Daniele Huillet and Jean-Marie Straub (1962-2006) the Marxist filmmakers understood their work as part of an ongoing effort to participate in the class struggle. Based on the notion of an elective affinity, Straub-Huillet's film adaptations challenge traditional forms of cinematic authorship and collaboration.
data.text: Elective Affinities - The Films of Daniele Huillet and Jean-Marie
